ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Fishing Expanded - Fishing Treasures AddOn
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Sarg Bjornson
ModMetaData.description:
The Vanilla Fishing Expanded - Fishing Treasures AddOn adds modded items to the "Special" fishing chance in Vanilla Fishing Expanded.
<size=24>Changelog</size>
v1.2: Updated for RimWorld 1.3 (06/07/21) v1.1: Added new mods to compat (06/05/21) v1.0: Release (26/04/21)
